room_title: Escape room "Alien Invasion" by Maine Escape Games in South Portland
review: Uncle Ned's Cabin was like an Indiana Jones adventure! Great time!!

room_title: Escape room "Alien Invasion" by Maine Escape Games in South Portland
review: Just completed the new spaceship room with my team and had so much fun! Great puzzles and A decent challenge with so many interactive puzzels.

room_title: Escape room "Alien Invasion" by Maine Escape Games in South Portland
review: Our family did the Alien room. What a blast! This was our first time and we were not sure what to expect. Very pleasantly surprised at how challenging and engaging this was! We are planning a return trip soon to participate in another room and I am going to recommend this to my boss as a great team building experience for our senior management team ! Thank you!!
